channel.title: The Family Reunion by First Church DeLand
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to `The Family Reunion’ podcast, where we share interesting happenings at our church (First Church DeLand), interviews and philosophical discussions. At First Church DeLand, we are The Family Place, and this podcast is the digital equivalent of catching up with your family at a reunion. Our goal is to Intentional share Christ’s love and salvation as God directs through this ministry. For more information about our church please visit https://firstchurchdeland.org
channel.itunes:author: First Church DeLand
channel.description: Welcome to `The Family Reunion’ podcast, where we share interesting happenings at our church (First Church DeLand), interviews and philosophical discussions. At First Church DeLand, we are The Family Place, and this podcast is the digital equivalent of catching up with your family at a reunion. Our goal is to Intentional share Christ’s love and salvation as God directs through this ministry. For more information about our church please visit https://firstchurchdeland.org
channel.itunes:subtitle: A weekly show dedicated to taking you behind the scenes of Captivate, where we’re actively helping you, the serious independent podcast creator, to save time, grow your audience and monetize your audio.

item.title: Our Youth Pastor, Lucy Hudson, discusses what's happening this school year
item.itunes:title: Our Youth Pastor, Lucy Hudson, discusses what's happening this school year
item.description: Hello and welcome to our first episode of The Family Reunion! In today's episode, we'll be hearing from Lucy Hudson, our Youth Pastor, about her philosophy for the 2023-2024 school year in our youth program. Additionally she will discuss some upcoming events and recently completed events.
item.content:encoded: Hello and welcome to our first episode of The Family Reunion! In today's episode, we'll be hearing from Lucy Hudson, our Youth Pastor, about her philosophy for the 2023-2024 school year in our youth program. Additionally she will discuss some upcoming events and recently completed events.
